conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 5-1;Non-pecuniary damage - award
issue: Article 342 of the Code of Criminal Procedure ; Article 107 § 1 of the Correctional Labour Code
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
